name: Spherical Dash
description:
Spherical Dash was made in 3 hours non consecutively for TriJam 180! 
Dash to kill the enemies before they reach the right side of the screen, but be careful you become mortal whenever red! (You are immortal when blue and kill enemies that run into you)

Credits:
